trends: There have been no other sightings in Oriente
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsit was a story publicated in our local newspaper la nueva provincia. (here is the complete url direction: http:\\www.lanueva.com\edicion_impresa\nota\nc\11\11\2007\7bb006.html )(this note is in spanish) the aproximate translation is: two cops were going around near the city of oriente (more or less 200km from bahia blanca) at 1.30pm when they saw a white light that illuminated all around. then, the light grew and became grey. near the police car, they saw a little-men-like-things of 80cm hight and big dark eyes near the light. one of the cops said that he couldn���t move, and his partner were outside the car. he saw another things going outside from the ufo (two were like the first he saw and another a little big than others.when the second cop returned to car, he started to cry and the beings returned to ship and flew away. the cops reported that the ship (or light) had a green halo and a withe light that taked a while to extinguish (they reported that green halo was like a rocket flame, perhaps. my english is limited. sorry!) the article continues saying that the same light was seen on another place near there, by another policeman lt. santiago walter. please check this article. thanks.
